channel.title: RZPK Release
channel.description:
Site Names
Moparscape: moparwha google: mr smith google: mr smith
If you see it by anyone else.
It's leached
Thank you Delta for the base.
Client is really ugly :mad: You can use any Deltascape client with lunar.
Features -Teleports actually teleport there. Varrock to Varrock Etc. -Added Dialouges To Some Npcs. Welcoming Hans. -200 exp per hit. Was going to have 70 but you can always change. -Shop items/Shops different. Most of them are in varrock. -Added lots of new training monsters. (Many Goblins Im Lumbridge, Guards in outskirts etc.) -Barrows with new items. No keys only killcount Spade used to get into tombs -Mining ores in Lumbridge Graveyard. Odd place with all ores. -Smithing at Lumbridge furnace. (I Put an anvil there to) -Ancient altar and prayer altar in Lumbridge Church. Didn't get around to removing other altar you can do that. -Kalphite Queen in al Kharid -Jad guy in Al kharid (You can get to pits from him so why make a portal) -Fixed runecrafting error. Some altars unable to enter. Etc -Made portal in aubury's shop to teleport you to essence mine. Ores work and portals teleport you back to Auburys -Other stuff. Like new objects added. Just have to find out for yourself -Spread out lots of npcs. Just look around. -Theiving In Ardougne now -Lever at home completes quests
Pictures [IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t350/ryan_0wns/rz1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t350/ryan_0wns/rz10.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t350/ryan_0wns/rz2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t350/ryan_0wns/rz3.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t350/ryan_0wns/rz4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t350/ryan_0wns/rz5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t350/ryan_0wns/rz6.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t350/ryan_0wns/rz7.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t350/ryan_0wns/rz8.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i514.photobucket.com/albums/t350/ryan_0wns/rz9.png[/img]
No virus scan.
Theres nothing harmful and does scanning .java files even do anything?
Check the run.bat to theres nothing
Link: http://uppit.com/YM4UNB
Hope You like it for my first release.

item.title: RZPK Release
item.dc:creator: @moparwha moparwha
item.description:
@moparwha wrote:

Site Names

Moparscape: moparwha
google: mr smith
google: mr smith

If you see it by anyone else.

It’s leached

Thank you Delta for the base.

Client is really ugly :mad: You can use any Deltascape client with lunar.

Features
-Teleports actually teleport there. Varrock to Varrock Etc.
-Added Dialouges To Some Npcs. Welcoming Hans.
-200 exp per hit. Was going to have 70 but you can always change.
-Shop items/Shops different. Most of them are in varrock.
-Added lots of new training monsters. (Many Goblins Im Lumbridge, Guards in outskirts etc.)
-Barrows with new items. No keys only killcount Spade used to get into tombs
-Mining ores in Lumbridge Graveyard. Odd place with all ores.
-Smithing at Lumbridge furnace. (I Put an anvil there to)
-Ancient altar and prayer altar in Lumbridge Church. Didn’t get around to removing other altar you can do that.
-Kalphite Queen in al Kharid
-Jad guy in Al kharid (You can get to pits from him so why make a portal)
-Fixed runecrafting error. Some altars unable to enter. Etc
-Made portal in aubury’s shop to teleport you to essence mine. Ores work and portals teleport you back to Auburys
-Other stuff. Like new objects added. Just have to find out for yourself
-Spread out lots of npcs. Just look around.
-Theiving In Ardougne now
-Lever at home completes quests

Pictures

No virus scan.

Theres nothing harmful and does scanning .java files even do anything?

Check the run.bat to theres nothing

Link:
http://uppit.com/YM4UNB

Hope You like it for my first release.

Read full topic
